title: Long-Term Sustained Online Education Program for Improving Pharmaceutical Calculation Skills

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: A systematic design based on Gagné's Nine Events of Instruction, emphasizing real-time interaction and personalized feedback through digital devices

learning_goals: Learners achieve over 80% accuracy in pharmaceutical calculation exams after 4 weeks.
Learners independently perform 10 core calculations, including prescription dosage, concentration calculations, and medication dosage determination.
Learners maintain over 85% of initial learning outcomes in follow-up assessments after 3 months.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
